text: (upbeat music)
- So when I first started,

there were very few women
in Solutions Architecture.

Being a woman SA has
definitely had its challenges.
We started our own Slack channel,
and there was about 10 of us in it.

- I was one of the founder
of Women at SA group.
I'm passionate about women in technology

or any other field where
there are not many women.
- The goal of these Women
at Solutions is to bring women together

as part of the Solutions
Architecture group
to help them develop their skill sets
to help them get together as a community.

- The Women at SA group
has been really amazing.

It's been really awesome
to be able to connect

with other females
within this organization
that are doing some really amazing work,
and it's been so inspiring.
- As a woman, you know,
I feel like Amazon is
is a really encouraging space.

This is a place where
you can feel included.

- We have some amazing women
leaders who have really
led the charge.
(upbeat music)
- It's covering the whole range
from the grassroot to the top.
We don't just talk about, you know,
inclusion,
but we are actually living

you know, inclusion,
diversity and equity here.

- As a manager, I need
to take responsibility
to work with my hiring teams
to bring in more diverse candidates.
- And it's really great
to see our teams have so much diversity.
- You can find people
with different background here.

Like for me, I'm a
Asian and I'm a veteran,
and I'm a woman.
And I can find people

with the same background
as me here at AWS.

- My advice to women who are
wanting to get into tech is...
Just dive in.
- Can definitely be
a little bit intimidating to pursue,

but there's so many
resources that are available.
- And then as you continue to grow

and kind of demonstrate an
affinity for one area or another,

you kind of can point that
into different directions
and maybe try out a different role.

- [Lia] Every time I see
something new and interesting,
I talk to my manager,
and I tell them my interest,
and they help me make that move.
- That leadership is very supportive
of your career aspirations.
- AWS is like the pinnacle where
the technology is being invented.
All the new cool stuffs happen there.
I can contribute to that invention

and can be happy that in
my own small little way,
you know, I contributed to that.
- I see this to continue growing, right?
All of us have a big part to play.
(upbeat music)

- Everybody here is welcome
and they are friendly.
AWS is definitely a great place to work.
(upbeat music)
